prompt_template:
# AI Cost Analysis Dashboard - Complete Specification

## Dashboard Overview
- **Name**: model_cost_comparison_sb
- **Label**: AI Cost Analysis
- **Description**: AI Cost Analysis
- **Dashboard Type**: Template with Storyboard
- **Theme**: Dark
- **Default Storyboard**: Storyboard 1

## Dashboard Sections

### Section: Agentic AI
**Show Filter**: Enabled

---

## Widgets Configuration (In Order)

### 1. Cost Breakdown per Model
- **Widget Type**: Custom Label (Dynamic Persona)
- **Position**: Row 1, Top Section
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 6
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Metric**: token_cost aggregated by llm_name
- **Display**: Horizontal scrollable cards showing cost per LLM model
- **Visual**: Green dollar amounts on dark cards (#1C1E22)

### 2. Cost Breakdown Per User
- **Widget Type**: Custom Label
- **Position**: Row 2
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 6
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Metric**: token_cost aggregated by user_id
- **Display**: Horizontal scrollable cards showing cost per user
- **Visual**: Orange dollar amounts on dark cards (#1C1E22)

### 3. Cost Breakdown per LLM (Persona)
- **Widget Type**: Custom Label (Dynamic Persona LLM)
- **Position**: Row 3
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 6
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Metric**: token_cost aggregated by ai_persona
- **Display**: Horizontal scrollable cards showing cost per persona
- **Visual**: Green dollar amounts on dark cards

### 4. Request Volume Overtime
- **Widget Type**: Timeseries Chart
- **Position**: Row 4, Left
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Time Range**: 10,800,000 hours (All Time)
- **Interval**: 30 minutes
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: metric_name
- **Legend**: None

### 5. Overall Cost Overtime
- **Widget Type**: Timeseries Chart
- **Position**: Row 5
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_cost'
- **Time Range**: 10,800,000 hours
- **Interval**: 30 minutes
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: metric_name
- **Legend**: None

---

## Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

### 6. Total Requests
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 1
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Formatter**: DescriptiveCountFormatter

### 7. Total Tokens
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 2
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_count'
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Formatter**: CountFormatter

### 8. Input Tokens
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 3
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_count' AND direction is 'input'
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Formatter**: CountFormatter

### 9. Output Tokens
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_count' AND direction is 'output'
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Formatter**: CountFormatter

### 10. Total Cost
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 5
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_cost'
- **Duration**: 100,000 hours
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Formatter**: Currency (USD, compact notation)

### 11. Total Tools Called
- **Widget Type**: Custom Counter
- **Position**: KPI Row, Card 6
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'tools_called'
- **Aggregation**: Sum of count_
- **Formatter**: CountFormatter

---

## Analytics Charts - Last 24 Hours

### 12. Request Volume (by LLM)
- **Widget Type**: Timeseries Chart
- **Position**: Row 6, Left
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Time Range**: 24 hours
- **Interval**: Auto
- **Aggregation**: Value count of metric_value
- **Group By**: llm_name
- **Legend**: Bottom

### 13. Hourly Cost Trend
- **Widget Type**: Timeseries Chart
- **Position**: Row 7, Right
- **Size**: Full width (12 columns), Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_cost' AND direction is not 'none'
- **Time Range**: 24 hours
- **Interval**: Auto
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: llm_name
- **Legend**: Bottom

---

## Distribution Charts

### 14. Request Type Distribution
- **Widget Type**: Pie Chart
- **Position**: Row 8, Left
- **Size**: 4-6 columns, Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count' AND direction is not 'none'
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: request_type

### 15. LLM Provider Usage on basis of Request Count
- **Widget Type**: Bar Chart (Vertical)
- **Position**: Row 8, Right
- **Size**: Variable width
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: llm_provider
- **Legend**: None
- **Stacked**: False

### 16. Token Usage Breakdown
- **Widget Type**: Multi Bar Chart (Stacked)
- **Position**: Row 9, Right
- **Size**: Variable width, Height: Variable
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_count'
- **Time Range**: 24 hours
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: direction, llm_name
- **Legend**: Bottom
- **Orientation**: Vertical

---

## Domain Analysis

### 17. Top Domains by Request Volume
- **Widget Type**: Bar Chart (Horizontal)
- **Position**: Row 10, Left
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: tool_domain
- **Legend**: None

### 18. Request per Domain
- **Widget Type**: Pie Chart
- **Position**: Row 8, Center
- **Size**: 4-6 columns, Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count' AND tool_domain is not empty
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: tool_domain

### 19. Tools Usage Pattern
- **Widget Type**: Pie Chart
- **Position**: Row 11
- **Size**: 4-6 columns, Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: tool_domain is not 'none'
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: tool_domain

### 20. Success Rate
- **Widget Type**: Pie Chart
- **Position**: Row 12, Left
- **Size**: 4-6 columns, Height: 4
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Aggregation**: Value count
- **Group By**: request_status

---

## Data Table

### 21. Tabular with Pstream Query Example
- **Widget Type**: Tabular
- **Position**: Row 13
- **Size**: 6 columns, Height: 8
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Query**: * (all fields)
- **Pagination**: Enabled
- **Remote Search**: Enabled
- **Max Rows**: 50
- **Sorting**: timestamp descending
- **Columns Displayed**:
  - ai_persona → "Persona"
  - llm_name → "LLM"
  - metric_name → "Metric Name"
  - metric_value → "Metric Value"
  - direction → "Direction"

---

## Persona-Based Analytics (Last 24 Hours)

### 22. Request per Persona
- **Widget Type**: Bar Chart (Vertical)
- **Position**: Row 14, Left
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'request_count'
- **Time Range**: 24 hours
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: llm_name
- **Legend**: None
- **Stacked**: False

### 23. Cost per Persona
- **Widget Type**: Bar Chart (Vertical)
- **Position**: Row 14, Right
- **Data Source**: ai_observability stream
- **Filter**: metric_name is 'token_cost' AND direction is not 'none'
- **Time Range**: 24 hours
- **Aggregation**: Sum of metric_value
- **Group By**: llm_name
- **Legend**: None
- **Stacked**: False

---

## Visual Design Elements

### Color Scheme
- **Background**: #040404 (Pure Black)
- **Cards Background**: #1C1E22 (Dark Gray)
- **Section Borders**: #0000AA with transparency
- **Text Primary**: #FFFFFF (White)
- **Text Secondary**: #CCCCCC (Light Gray)
- **Accent Colors**:
  - Green: Cost metrics (positive)
  - Orange: User costs
  - Red: Alerts/Critical
  - Cyan: Data points

### Typography
- **Primary Font**: Orbitron
- **Fallback Fonts**: Avenir, sans-serif
- **Header Size**: 16px
- **Letter Spacing**: 1.5px
- **Line Height**: 1.5

### Custom Animations
- **Agent Logo**: Up and down floating animation (3s ease-in-out infinite)
- **Alert Indicator**: Pulsing red core with expanding rings
- **Data Collection**: Animated dots converging to center
- **Analysis Bars**: Bouncing height animation

---

## Data Stream Configuration
- **Primary Stream**: ai_observability
- **Timestamp Column**: timestamp
- **Default Time Filter**: All Time
- **Live Edit**: Enabled

---

## Key Metrics Tracked
1. Request count
2. Token count (input/output)
3. Token cost
4. Tools called
5. Request status
6. LLM provider usage
7. Tool domain activity
8. Persona performance
9. User-specific costs
template_description: Use this template to query the data and then visualize the AI Cost Analysis Dashboard
